DOC.brief_summary: This observational study will evaluate Xeloda (capecitabine) monotherapy on the effect of disease-free survival in patients with colon cancer stage III (Duke C) after surgical resection. Data will be collected for 3 years.
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study of Xeloda (Capecitabine) Monotherapy in Patients With Colorectal Cancer (AXEL)
DOC.criteria: Adult patients, over the age of 18 years Presence of colon adenocarcinoma Surgical resection for colon cancer stage III (Duke C) Prior adjuvant therapy with Xeloda monotherapy Contraindications for Xeloda
